Name: Summer Fling
About the game: You are entering your summer break before university begins. And what better way to spend a summer break than at the lake with two friends, will the summer become an unforgettable time or will it just fade away. Make your own choices on what to do as the story develops. Your choices will effect the events and the games final ending. Includes multiple endings with both girls and a 'harem' secret ending to unlock as well. A short fun, light hearted story of love on a summer weekend at the lake. Features : Multiple Choices that effect the endings. Steam Achievements & Trading Cards. Original Musical Score by Sam L. Jones. Choose the name for the protagonist. Romantic liaisons and a secret ending. Un-lockable CG Gallery.
